column2: "Hyira EWURADZE
column5: ɔwo eso kɛsekɛse ae; Ɔwo ahyɛ enyidzi na tumdzi dɛ atar."

column2: "Ɔwo a ifura kan dɛ tam; Ɔwo a etserɛw ɔsorsor mu dɛ ntamadan ho tam:"
"Ɔwo a edze wo mpia mpuna sa esu do; Na edze mununkum yɛ wo tseaseanam; Ɔwo a ɔdze mframa atsaban nantsew:"
"Na edze mframa yɛ w'abɔfoe; Ogyaframee yɛ w'asomfo:"
"Ɔwo a edze asaase fapem etsim hɔ
"Ɔwo edze bun kataa do dɛ edze efuradze; Nsu no gyinagyinaa mbepɔw do."
"W'enyimtwuw ntsi woguanguanee; Wo senaman ndze ntsi wɔyɛɛ ntsɛm kɔree;"
"Mbepɔw soɛrsoɛree
"Ɔwo etwa ɔhe dɛ mma wɔnntra; Na wɔnnsan mmbɛkata asaase do bio."
"Ɔwo itue nsunyiwa wɔ mbɔnsa mu; Wɔpem nenam mbepɔw ntamu."
"Wɔma hambowa biara nya nsu nom; Hamu nsoasopɔnkɔ dze ku hɔn nsukɔm."
"Hɔn do na wimu ntumbowa nya hɔn tsenabew
column3: Hɔn ndubaa mu na wofi ma hɔn ndze do."

column2: "Ifi wo mpia mu gugu mbepɔw do nsu: Wo ndwuma aba amee asaase."
"Ema nkyɛkyɛr fifir ma fiembowa
column3: Na efuw ma nyimpa no dwumadzi; Ama ɔaama edziban a efi asaase mu."

column2: "Na wenyin a ɔma ɔdasanyi n'akoma n'enyi gye
column3: Na ngo a ɔma n'enyim hyerɛn
column4: Na edziban a ɔhyɛ dasanyi n'akoma dzen."

column2: "EWURADZE gugu no ndua do nsu; Lebanon ndua akɛse a ɔtsɛwee no."
"Mbrɛ nnoma yɛ hɔn mberɛbuw: Esukɔnkɔn dze
column3: ne fie nye kupresi ndua do."

column2: "Mbepɔw atsentsen yɛ nwi tsenabew; Abotan yɛ twambowa guandɔbea."
"Ɔyɛɛ bosoom dze kyerɛɛ mber: Ewia nyim no tɔber."
"Ɔwo na ema sum gye
column3: na adze sa; No mu na kwaa mu mbowa nyinara weawea fir edzi."

column2: "Ngyataburwa pɔw dzi hɔn afonam ekyir
column3: Na wɔhwehwɛ hɔn edziban wɔ Nyankopɔn hɔ."

column2: "Ewia fir a
"Nyimpa fir edzi kɔ n'edwuma Na no dwumadzi ho kodu ewimbir."
"Ao
column4: mbrɛ wo ndwuma dua dɔɔ so a! Nyansa mu na ayɛ hɔn nyinara: Asaase ahyɛ w'abɔdze ma."

column2: "Po na ɔda noho no
column4: No mu na aweaweambowa a wonnyi ano wɔ

column2: "Hɔ na ahɛn nenamee; Bonso a eyɛɛ no dɛ ɔngor mu so wɔ hɔ."
"Iyinom nyinara hwɛ wo kwan
column3: Ma aama hɔn hɔn edziban wɔ ber a ɔsɛ mu."

column2: "Dza ɔwo edze ma hɔn na wɔtase; Ɔwo ibue wo nsamu a
"Ɔwo ihuntsa w'enyim a
column3: wɔberɛ; Sɛ iyi hɔn ahom a
column5: Na wɔsan kɔ hɔn huntuma mu."

column2: "Ɔwo esoma wo sunsum ba
column4: Na ɔwo na ema asaase enyi yɛ fofor."

column2: "Wɔmma EWURADZE n'enyimnyam nko hɔ daa; Wɔmma EWURADZE n'enyi ngye wɔ no ndwuma mu:"
"Ɔno a ɔhwɛ asaase
column3: ma ɔwosow; Ɔka mbepɔw ma wopun wusiw."

column2: "Metse ase yi mobɔtow ndwom ama EWURADZE: Mowɔ hɔ yi mobɔtow ayɛyindwom ama me Nyankopɔn."
"Wɔmma m'adwendwen nyɛ no dɛw: Mibedzi ehurusi wɔ EWURADZE mu."
"Wɔmma ndzebɔnyɛfo nsa wɔ asaase do
column3: Na mma mma emumuyɛfo nntsena hɔ bio. Hyira EWURADZE
column4: ao me kra. Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw."
